text: Sonic Rivals 2 is a 2007 racing video game, the sequel to the 2006 game Sonic Rivals. The game was made by Backbone Entertainment and supervised by Sega Studio USA, for the PlayStation Portable handheld video game console. Sonic Rivals 2 was released across November and December 2007. == References == Category:2007 video games Category:PlayStation Portable games Category:PlayStation Portable-only games Category:Sega video games Category:Side-scrolling video games Category:Sonic the Hedgehog spin-off games Category:Virtual Console games for Wii U Category:Video games developed in Japan Category:Video game sequels
title: Sonic Rivals 2
